“Seeing how many people were texting during class vs how many were using google calendar, it was a no brainer for me to try to help students who text the whole class keep up with their tasks”

“I noticed students juggling endless group chats and assignments but struggling to stay on top of everything. I wanted to create a tool that meets students where they already are—on their phones.”

"As a college swimmer, balancing practice, classes, and assignments was always a challenge. I built this assistant to help students like me stay organized and succeed, no matter how packed their schedules are."
